se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model.GameInterface

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements se.chalmers.dat255.risk.model.GameInterface
    The top game class. Controls flow between our lower classes, such as the battle handler and the WorldMap.
